Chapters with the word "if" in the title are usually alternate universe things. They aren't really canon. It's safe to pretend this one doesn't exist.
Judging by what the Japanese version is showing me, it seems like the Elf is a whore and the teacher got cucked... This is what I get for believing that not all Elf doujins are trash...
